BundleInfo.name: ChimeraX-ExperimentalCommands
BundleInfo.Author: UCSF RBVI
BundleInfo.Description: A collection of commands that might become a standard part of ChimeraX.

Classifiers.ChimeraXClassifier: ChimeraX :: Command :: ribbon :: General :: show cartoon for selected residues
ChimeraX :: Command :: ribbon hide :: General :: hide cartoon for selected residues
ChimeraX :: Command :: ~ribbon :: General :: hide cartoon for selected residues
ChimeraX :: Command :: getcrd :: General :: report atomic coordinates
ChimeraX :: Command :: debug dumpspec :: General :: report what a specifier matches
